scm-support-plugin.title: Support
scm-support-plugin.subtitle: Gather support information for this SCM-Manager instance

collect.help: Will give you the following information about this SCM-Manager instance:

log.help: Switch logging to trace level and gather a lot of logs for a limited time. To do this, enable the log. You will get the results when you switch it off again. Additionally, this will give you the information as listed above.
log.warning: Please keep in mind that this may slow down this SCM-Manager instance.

information.description: May gather support information like system information, installed plugins and stack traces

information,logging.description: May start and stop trace level system logging and read these logs and other support information
